Two of the following words do not belong in the same category. Identify them.
Saber, Shotgun, Spear

The words "Saber" and "Spear" do not belong in the same category as "Shotgun." Both "Saber" and "Spear" are types of melee weapons, typically used in close combat, whereas a "Shotgun" is a type of firearm used for ranged combat.
